title: Venetian Prawn Tartare with Vanilla & Lemon — Foodie Fuel
method: Heat olive oil gently in a wide pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until just fragrant, not coloured.
Add the raw king prawns and cook gently until just done: fish 6–10 minutes, prawns 5–6 minutes, meat 15–20 minutes.
Deglaze with white wine and allow alcohol to cook off for 2 minutes.
Fold through beans or lentils and radicchio; warm gently.
Finish with lemon juice, herbs and olive oil.
plating: Spoon beans and greens onto warm plates, arrange the fish or meat neatly on top, finish with herbs and oil.
swaps: Swap seafood for another Adriatic fish if required.
hydrationTip: Still water or lightly sparkling mineral water.
